name: Daemon Bride
description: Daemon Bride is a 2D Fighting Game made by Examu of Arcana Heart fame, and the gameplay is pretty similar too. It could be said that Daemon Bride is what BlazBlue is for Arcana Heart's Guilty Gear, well except that Daemon Bride replaces 'Arcana' with 'Angels and Demons' for helpers, and has more sausages compared to Arcana Heart's melon-fest. It sadly has yet to receive a console release nor a release outside the Japanese version.
